subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: After a shaky start, the Bulldogs settled into their typical pounding formula, defeating the Lions and inching closer to their first N.C.A.A. tournament berth since 1962.
snippet: After a shaky start, the Bulldogs settled into their typical pounding formula, defeating the Lions and inching closer to their first N.C.A.A. tournament berth since 1962.
